title: akali skin code
body: so I got an akali skin code where do I enter the code to get my skin for akali????

replies.body:
i want one gode for akali
{{champion:84}}

You can hop into the store, hit the *Purchase RP* button, then enter it under the *Prepaid Cards & Codes* area. Below is a screenshot to assist you.

(Click to enlarge)
http://imgur.com/a/zrlfJ

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QEJwEjnz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-24T02:26:44.418+0000)
>
> You can hop into the store, hit the *Purchase RP* button, then enter it under the *Prepaid Cards & Codes* area. Below is a screenshot to assist you.

> Let me know if you have any other questions.

So glad you will comment on a fucking skin comment and not the akali mains rework posts from legitimate people. *clap* *clap*
Virst you clock on the shop, then go over and click on accounts next to the gift button, then go to the left and find the redeem codes option.
